build.beforeDevCommand: npx cross-env DESKTOP_MODE=1 npm run dev
build.beforeBuildCommand: npx cross-env DESKTOP_MODE=1 npm run build -- v0

security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' asset: data:; connect-src 'self' asset: https:;
security.dev_csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' asset: data:; connect-src 'self' asset: https: http://localhost:4000 ws://localhost:4000;
